name: Mrs. Gustav E. Kissel
biography: The Granddaughter of Cornelius Vanderbilt, Mrs. Caroline Thorn Kissel was a prominent socialite and philanthropist, especially in the 40 years after her husband’s death. Even at the time of her death at age 91, the vigorously active matron was president of two large charities.
biography_75_words: The Granddaughter of Cornelius Vanderbilt, Mrs. Caroline Thorn Kissel was a prominent socialite and philanthropist, especially in the 40 years after her husband’s death. Even at the time of her death at age 91, the vigorously active matron was president of two large charities.
biography_50_characters: A prominent socialite and active philanthropist
